## OrderPaymentMethod interface

Contains details about the payment method used to pay for the order

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OrderPaymentMethod 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [additional\_data?](./magento-api.orderpaymentmethod.additional_data.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[KeyValue](./magento-api.keyvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional data per payment method type |
|  [name](./magento-api.orderpaymentmethod.name.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The label that describes the payment method |
|  [type](./magento-api.orderpaymentmethod.type.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The payment method code that indicates how the order was paid for |
